com.github.mmichaelis.hamcrest.nextdeed.glue

Class DescribedFunction<T,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mmichaelis.hamcrest.nextdeed.glue.DescribedFunction<T,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - input type of function
    R - output type of function
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<T,R>

    public class DescribedFunction<T,R>
extends Object
implements Function<T,R>

    A function which can be described.

    Usage:
    
 DescribedFunction.describe(fn).as("description");
    Since:
    1.0.0
